original_text: and every firstborn in the land of Egypt shall die, from the firstborn of Pharaoh who sits on his throne, even to the firstborn of the slave girl who is behind the handmill, and all the firstborn of the cattle.
korean_text: 애굽 땅에 있는 모든 처음 난 것은 왕위에 앉아 있는 바로의 장자로부터 맷돌 뒤에 있는 몸종의 장자와 모든 가축의 처음 난 것까지 죽으리니

sentences.original_text: and every firstborn in the land of Egypt shall die
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 애굽 땅에 있는 모든 장자는 죽으리니

sentences.original_text: even to the firstborn of the slave girl
and all the firstborn of the cattle
